titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation commanding all deputie-lieutenants, and justices of peace, to attend those places in their proper counties: and that those that have houses and lands in the northern parts, shall resort thither, and reside there with their families.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: ... Whitehall the fourteenth day of May, in the sixteenth yeer of Our reign.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
